name: DepthQVR_AQUA
description: DepthQVR_AQUA - A layered experiential environment filled with intuitive interaction, story immersion and exhilaration for successful engagement. DepthQVR® is a fun & engaging immersive ride experience for PC Café, Entertainment Attractions, Brand Experiences, and Educational Attractions whose immersive participatory nature, playful ‘natural-touch’ interactivity, and exhilarating body motion surprises and delights viewers of all ages, sparking lasting memories.
